title: [Widow's Beach, Driftwood's Rest]
description: Seashells tumbled smooth speckle the soft white sand of the expansive beach, and wavelets move rhythmically in and out along the shore.  Isolated just beyond the water's reach, a driftwood log rests next to a small pile of broken crab shells.
Seashells tumbled smooth crest the soft white sand.  Small waves move rhythmically in and out along the shore down the beach.  A driftwood log rests isolated just outside of the water's reach.
